name: Alpacaby
description:
This ain't no game! This is a fun button-smashing, adrenaline-bashing, boredom-slashing alpaca farm adventure to enjoy with your friends and familly.

Development

Even though Alpacaby is released I'm still planing to add more maps.

So if you want to see more of Alpacaby comment, share and play this game! It helps to know that someone cares! 

Also if you want to suggest something or have found a bug let me know at Alpacaby - Bugs & Feedback or down in the comments.
